content: this is a summary of a legal case involving a dispute over the division of a property inheritance the court of appeals in naples issued a final resolution on june 9 2020 regarding a nonfinal judgment from 2016 the appeal was brought by several parties including aigi aian fere and aira the court upheld the appeal and declared that a property in vico equense italy should be divided among the parties the property consists of two areas of land and a building the court assigned ownership of the property to the parties based on their existing shares and ordered some parties to pay monetary compensation to others the judgment will be transcribed by the internal revenue agency

metadata.CASE_ID: Corte appello Napoli sez. II, 09/06/2020, n.2064
